Hmmm isn’t stddev symmetrical at origin?

 instead of x + delta.

body:
Hmmm isn’t stddev symmetrical at origin?

On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 02:10 Vishwak Srinivasan <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> It won't be negative, but I think it'll be higher if you take x - delta
> instead of x + delta.
